text: Ni twampele (Ibrahimajo mwanache jwakuŵilanjikwa) Isihaka kwisa soni (chisukulu chakuŵilanjikwa) Yaakubu, jwalijose mwa jamanjao twan'jongwele, nombe najo Nuhu twan'jongwele kala (Ibrahima nkanaiche), soni mu ŵanache ŵakwe (ŵa Nuhu twan'jongwele) Daudi, Sulaimana, Ayyubu, Yusufu, Musa ni Haruna, soni iyyoyopeyo niyatukutiji pakwalipila ŵakolosya
